channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- Download Station
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- Download Station

item.title: CVE-2021-34809|2024-09-16T19:56:48.051Z -- synology -- download%20station
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in a command ('Command Injection') vulnerability in task management component in Synology Download Station before 3.8.16-3566 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-34811|2024-09-16T17:48:15.120Z -- synology -- download%20station
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in task management component in Synology Download Station before 3.8.16-3566 allows remote authenticated users to access intranet resources via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-34810|2024-09-16T16:14:21.210Z -- synology -- download%20station
item.description: Improper privilege management vulnerability in cgi component in Synology Download Station before 3.8.16-3566 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.
